page.title: 13SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE SIX FULL TIME TEACHERS AND SIX PERIPETIC TEACHERS.NEXT TERM THE SCHOOL IS GETTING A NEW HEADMASTER CALLED MR.HANNAH.THE MORNING BELL GOES AT TWENTY PAST NINE.WE GO FOR A SNACK AT ELEVEN O,CLOCK UNTIL TWENTY PAST ELEVEN.OUR LUNCH BREAK IS FROM QUARTER TO ONE UNTIL HALF PAST.THE AFTERNOON BREAK IS FROM TWO FORTY FIVE UNTIL THREE O,CLOCK.WE GO HOME AT HALF PAST THREE.ALL OF THE TEACHERS SAID IT WAS AN EASY SCHOOL BUILDING TO WORK IN.THE TEACHERS ARE MRS LEASK _P1,MRS FRASER _ P2 AND 3,MRS GOODLAD _ P4,MRS SMITH _ P5,MRS CABLE _ P6,MRS SCOTT _ P7.THERE IS A PLAYGROUND,MULTICOURT,SCHOOL GYM HALL,MUSIC ROOM AND ART ROOM.
